info.official_title: A Phase 4 Long-term Follow-up Study to Define the Safety Profile of Radium-223 Dichloride
info.inclusion_criteria:
* Subject was previously enrolled in a selected company sponsored feeder trial, and has received at least 1 dose of radium 223 dichloride or placebo in the feeder trial
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
info.exclusion_criteria: * Not applicable to this follow up study

inclusion_lines.line: * Subject was previously enrolled in a selected company sponsored feeder trial, and has received at least 1 dose of radium 223 dichloride or placebo in the feeder trial
